author: Ace Bawitlung
text:
1. HIMATA IS THE PET DOG OF AMIT SHAH
2. SONOWAL WAS A GENTLEMAN, HIMANTA IS A PLAGUE
3. BEFORE HIMANTA, ALL SEVEN SISTERS LIVED IN PEACE
#shame_on_assam #cancelassamCM #ShameOnHimantaBiswa #shameonassam #assamshotfirst #gobackassam
